page.title: 02Local Superstitions (1)
page.content: The Street area is steeped in history, although the town itself is relatively new.The outlying villages are much older and have a wealth of stories and superstitions attached to them.Here is one of the stories from our area. {The Haunted Trousers Near{Butleigh Wootton}300 years ago was the{Battle of Sedgemoor}between the{Royalists}and{Monmouths}rebels. Just outside Glastonbury there is a road going to Butleigh Wootton with cedar trees on each side forming an avenue.People say that they have seen a pair of trousers and knee length boots walking in and out of the trees. People say it is the bottom half of a rebel trying to find his way home from the battle.
